TITLE: Does your game have a title? If yes enter it, otherwise, answer 'no'
NUM_PUZZLES: How many puzzles does your hangman game have? Enter a number.
NUM_LIVES: How many lives will players get in total? Enter a number.
NUM_HINTS: How many hints will players get in total? Enter a number.
PUZZLE_ANSWER: What is the answer to the next puzzle?
PUZZLE_PROMPT: What is the prompt for that puzzle?
PUBLIC: Will the game be public? enter yes/no.
CONFIRMATION: Confirm you would like to create this game, enter yes/no.
